markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Deeper Dabbler](/Feats.aspx?ID=6422) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 217 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Talisman Dabbler](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=266)

**Prerequisites**
[Talisman Dabbler Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6420)

</column>

---

With some streamlining to your process and a deeper collection of [talisman](/Equipment.aspx?Category=15&Subcategory=19) materials, you make a greater number of talismans every day. You can create two additional talismans during your daily preparations.

**Special** You can select this feat a second time if you are 14th level or higher.
name: Deeper Dabbler
